name: A House, Haunted
description:
This house is haunted.

The cracked walls where you find yourself do not feel like home.

This house is haunted. It is worse empty than filled with spirits.

One thought burns at your lonely mind: You must find your way home.

This house is haunted, but by what?

This was made for the August 2020 Summer Slow Jam.

wasd to move
mouse to look
